scripts.ISP: npx tsc src/ISP/main.ts --outDir src/ISP/dist && node src/ISP/dist/main.js
scripts.DIP: npx tsc src/DIP/main.ts --outDir src/DIP/dist && node src/DIP/dist/main.js
